valmo.geco.control
Class RegistryBuilder

java.lang.Object
  valmo.geco.control.Control
      valmo.geco.control.RegistryBuilder
All Implemented Interfaces:
Announcer.StageListener
public class RegistryBuilder
extends Control

RegistryBuilder is solely responsible for file-based persistence of Registry in csv format (using the valmo.geco.csv package).

Since:
Jan 20, 2009
